lead_paragraph: Democrats accused Republicans on Tuesday of taking their cues from Donald Trump after the Senate's No. 2 Republican said President Barack Obama's nominee to the Supreme Court should expect to be treated like a "piñata."

headline.main: Democrats Denounce GOP 'Pinata' Comment on Supreme Court
headline.print_headline: Democrats Denounce GOP 'Pinata' Comment on Supreme Court

snippet: Democrats accused Republicans on Tuesday of taking their cues from Donald Trump after the Senate's No. 2 Republican said President Barack Obama's nominee to the Supreme Court should expect to be treated like a "piñata."
